body: John Wells Smith is a widely known British artist whose delightful compositions typically depict children engaged in activities normal to 19th century England. His compositions, with attention to background detail, artfully convey the activity and the emotion evoked. A master of the genre, his works have been sold through renowned auction houses such as Sothebyâs and Christieâs.
dimensions: Oil on canvas, 17.25 x 21.25 inches / Signed lower left with artist's monogram
